ProductClassification.name: ProductClassification
ProductClassification.description: Represents a template that holds a collection of dynamic attributes. Product classification is used to quickly define and create multiple products that are similar yet different.

Code.description: A unique code for the product classification. The maximum size is 80 alphanumeric characters. The code can include the following special characters: @ ! - < > * ? + = % # ( ) / \ & ‘ £ € $ ”.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the product classification record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the product classification record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the product classification. The maximum length is 80 characters (of any type).

OwnerId.description: The owner of the product classification.

Status.description: The lifecycle status of the product classification.
